import React, {useState} from 'react' import styles from './modal-tweet.module.css' import Photo from '../photo' import IconButton from '../icon-button' import {Close} from '../icons' import ThemeButton from '../theme-button' var layout= [] var yeni=["HOŞGELDİNİZ"] function ModalTweet({onClick= () => {}}) { const [idea,setIdea]=useState([]) const onSubmit= (e) => { yeni=[...yeni] // layout=yeni.map((gelen,index)=> layout[index]=gelen) yeni.forEach((e,i)=> { layout[i]=e }) console.log('LAYOUT', layout); e.preventDefault() layout.push( idea) sessionStorage.setItem('TEXT',JSON.stringify(layout)) onClick(false) } return (
